issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: AMReporter only remember first AM that submit the query and heartbeat to it. In case of external client, there might be multiple 'AM's and every of them need node heartbeat.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12883869 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

nit: getAMNodeInfo gets the same thing twice from the hashmap
Why did AMNodeInfo cease being static?
Thanks [~sershe] for review! We need AMNodeInfo not to be static so that we can override its method to for unit test.
Attached new patch to address comments.
